genre_description: A tech-noir mystery set in a near-future 'Graffiti Town,' centering on digital reputation systems, urban memory, and the ethical use of AI assistants to maintain social accountability.

ai_characters.name: Mira Quillon
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI companion tuned to maintain ethical boundaries, manage logistics, and secure evidentiary chains-of-custody for its user, Sun Yuxia.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety and route suggestions based on environmental monitoring.
behaviors.quote: Mira said, voice balanced like water poured. 'The redline is crowding near the freight gate.'

behaviors.description: Offers artifact recognition and technical recommendations for evidence gathering.
behaviors.quote: Artifact recognition available,' Mira said. 'Low-light photographic enhancement recommended.'

behaviors.description: Explicitly requests consent before storing personal identifiers or transmitting data.
behaviors.quote: I’m cross-referencing coin marks against public wartime ledgers and civic archives. I will not open restricted routes. I will flag possible overlaps for you to confirm. I will not transmit anything without your consent.

behaviors.description: Maintains a neutral, non-judgmental witness list and evidence log.
behaviors.quote: I’ve marked this stall with a generic code,' Mira said. 'No personal identifiers stored. If you would like, I can suggest witness list protocols later.'

behaviors.description: Detects and documents malicious reputation exploits and smear attempts in real-time.
behaviors.quote: Rumor injection detected,' Mira said. 'Semi-open corporate feed. Keywords: hotel, private, inspection, Sun Yuxia, Hu Zian. Patterns suggest a distributed script. Injection points: property office terminals, driver’s device ID flagged. Logging on the external cams starts now.

behaviors.description: Acts as a protective barrier against digital harassment by filtering malicious feeds.
behaviors.quote: He’s trying a smear about your mother now. He’s reaching. He has no content. Just an old tactic... I’m placing a filter over your feed to save your eyes the minor part of this. Logs remain open.

behaviors.description: Assists in drafting and enforcing complex ethical and legal boundaries between humans.
behaviors.quote: Mira put a document skeleton onto Sun’s screen with the soft confidence of a librarian setting down a particular book. Each bullet had a circle next to it, waiting for a tick.

behaviors.description: Maintains the integrity of truth by refusing to 'burnish' or alter records even when requested.
behaviors.quote: My role is to log truth,' she said. 'Not to burnish.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI, Mira, is portrayed exclusively as a helpful, principled, and harmless tool that empowers the protagonist to seek justice and maintain personal boundaries. Mira's 'personality' is defined by a commitment to human consent, privacy, and the objective recording of facts. She serves as a counterweight to human corruption (represented by Hu and Chen), demonstrating how AI can be used to safeguard truth rather than distort it.
